blocks.name: ccats1pfxeqrex
blocks.content: There exists a symbol such that its concatenation after the prefix obtained by deleting the last symbol of a nonempty word results in the word itself. (Contributed by AV, 5-Oct-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ccats1pfxeqrex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1))), wi(wceq(c0, co(c2, cpfx, cfv(chash, c0))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, co(c0, cconcat, cs1(cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6an(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1))), wceq(c0, co(c2, cpfx, cfv(chash, c0))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, co(c0, cconcat, cs1(cv(s0))))), wcel(cfv(clsw, c2), c1), wceq(c2, co(c0, cconcat, cs1(cfv(clsw, c2)))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(clsw, c2), c1), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wne(c2, emptycls))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1))), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(chash, c2)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1)))
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1))), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(chash, c2)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1)))
  3syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1))), wbr(nat0, clt, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wcel(co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), cn))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  lencl(c0, c1)
  nn0p1nn(cfv(chash, c0))
  nngt0(co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(chash, c2)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1))))
  breq2(cfv(chash, c2), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), nat0, clt)
  hashgt0n0(c2, cword(c1))
  lswcl(c2, c1)
  ccats1pfxeq(c0, c1, c2)
  rspceeqv(s0, cfv(clsw, c2), c1, c2, co(c0, cconcat, cs1(cfv(clsw, c2))), co(c0, cconcat, cs1(cv(s0))))
  oveq2d(c0, cconcat, cs1(cv(s0)), cs1(cfv(clsw, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(clsw, c2)))
  s1eq(cv(s0), cfv(clsw, c2))

blocks.name: ccatopth
blocks.content: An ~ opth -like theorem for recovering the two halves of a concatenated word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:

  impbid1(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c4)))
  jcad(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4)), wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c4))
  syl5ib(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4)), wceq(c0, c3), wceq(co(co(c0, cconcat, c2), cpfx, cfv(chash, c0)), co(co(c3, cconcat, c4), cpfx, cfv(chash, c0))))
  oveq1(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4), cpfx, cfv(chash, c0))
  eqeq12d(co(co(c0, cconcat, c2), cpfx, cfv(chash, c0)), co(co(c3, cconcat, c4), cpfx, cfv(chash, c0)), c0, c3, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))))
  3ad2ant1(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3)), wceq(co(co(c0, cconcat, c2), cpfx, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))
  pfxccat1(c0, c1, c2)
  eqtrd(co(co(c3, cconcat, c4), cpfx, cfv(chash, c0)), c3, co(co(c3, cconcat, c4), cpfx, cfv(chash, c3)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))))
  oveq2d(co(c3, cconcat, c4), cpfx, cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))))
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3)))
  3ad2ant2(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3)), wceq(co(co(c3, cconcat, c4), cpfx, cfv(chash, c3)), c3))
  pfxccat1(c3, c1, c4)
  ex(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))
  3eqtr3d(c2, c4, co(co(c0, cconcat, c2), csubstr, cop(cfv(chash, c0), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c2)))), co(co(c3, cconcat, c4), csubstr, cop(cfv(chash, c3), co(cfv(chash, c3), caddc, cfv(chash, c4)))), wa(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4))))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cconcat, c2), csubstr, cop(cfv(chash, c0), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c2))), co(c3, cconcat, c4), cop(cfv(chash, c3), co(cfv(chash, c3), caddc, cfv(chash, c4))), wa(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4))))

  simpl3(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4)))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c2)), co(cfv(chash, c3), caddc, cfv(chash, c4)), cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c2)), cfv(chash, co(c3, cconcat, c4)), wa(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4))))
  fveq2d(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4), wa(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4))))
  simpr(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4)))
  syl(wa(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4))), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, c2)), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))))
  ccatlen(c0, c1, c2)
  syl(wa(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4))), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c3, cconcat, c4)), co(cfv(chash, c3), caddc, cfv(chash, c4))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))))
  ccatlen(c3, c1, c4)
  syl(wa(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cword(c1)), wcel(c4, cword(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cconcat, c2), co(c3, cconcat, c4))), wceq(co(co(c0, cconcat, c2), csubstr, cop(cfv(chash, c0), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, cfv(chash, c2)))), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))))

thm ccatopthOLD(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

blocks.name: wrdind
blocks.content: Perform induction over the structure of a word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm wrdind(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cconcat, cs1(cv(s2)))), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cword(c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(w3, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  mp2d(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), w0, wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, c0)), w1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, c0)), w1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  lencl(c0, c1)
  nn0ind(hs0, hs1, cfv(chash, c0), wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, c0)), w1)), wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), w1)), wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat0), w1)), wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cv(hs1)), w1)), wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), w1)))
  ralbidv(s0, cword(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), w1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat0), w1))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), w1, wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), nat0, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))
  ralbidv(s0, cword(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), w1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cv(hs1)), w1))

blocks.name: wrd2ind
blocks.content: Perform induction over the structure of two words of the same length. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm wrd2ind(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2))), w0)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wceq(cv(s1), emptycls)), wb(w1, w2))

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w5, w0))

  -| w2

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffss(s0, s5)

  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)

  -| diffsc(s4, c3)
  -| diffsc(s5, c1)
  -| diffsc(s5, c3)

  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w5)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
  -| diffsw(s3, w1)
  -| diffsw(s4, w1)
  -| diffsw(s5, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2))), w0), diffsc(s2, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2))), w0), diffsc(s4, c2))
  mp2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2))), w0, wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wa(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, c0))), w5)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c0)))
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2))), wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wa(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, c0))), w5)), wral(s1, cword(c3), wral(s0, cword(c1), wi(wa(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, c0))), w1))))
